channel.title: bash on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in bash on Notes

item.title: Notes about stdout && stdin
item.description: Work with strems Command Description cmd > file execute program cmd and send it output tp file, if file exists - rewrite it or creates it cmd >> file append data from cmd to file cmd2 < file execute cmd2 with data from file cmd3 > file1 < file2 execute cmd3 change output and input `cmd cmd1` cmd 2> errfile send stream of errors to errfile `cmd 2>&1 cmd6` -rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 14322 date /bin/cat
